MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Slateford Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 5:24AM. Our engineers have arrived on site at Harrison Gardens substation  and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. If this information changes we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:50AM on 14 February 2021.
